name: BluettiVoiceAssistant
0:
”Alexa,turn on my power direct current”
”Alexa,turn off my power direct current”
”Alexa,turn on my power alternating current”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With Alexa, you can easily control the DC or AC switches of BLUETTI devices through simple conversations. Fast connectivity and good compatibility are also important features of this skill. In the future, more commands will be available to help view the remaining power of the device or the status of different modules

The role of BLUETTI Voice Assistant skills:

1. You can check the remaining battery power of the device

You can control the DC and AC switches of the device

3. You can obtain the latest status of the device in real-time


To do this, perform the following simple steps:

1. Enable and enter your Bluetti app account and password.

2. Discover your device and view your device list.

If you need a better voice experience, it is recommended to change an interesting and meaningful device name

"Finally, you can wake up Alexa and say, 'Alexa, turn on my power supply DC' or 'Alexas, turn off my power supply AC',",


Tips:

Please note that "my power" is the name you set for the device
